channel.title: Detroit Symphony Orchestra
channel.description:
Detroit Symphony Orchestra concert series, recorded at the Ford Auditorium on the Detroit Riverfront.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Brahms, Blomdahl, and Bartok, part 4
item.description: This program, the fourth of four parts, presents part of a concert that included performances of pieces by Brahms, Blomdahl, and Bartok. The Detroit Symphony Orchestra is conducted by Sixten Ehrling.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Symphony music

item.title: Tchaikovsky, Wagner, Franck, and Chabrier, part 3
item.description: This program, the third of three parts, presents part of a concert that included performances of pieces by Tchaikovsky, Wagner, Franck, and Chabrier. The Detroit Symphony Orchestra is conducted by Paul Paray.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Symphony music
